'Khejri Bachao Andolan': Why Rajasthan is rallying to protect its 'Kalpavriksha'?
description: A significant protest is under way in Rajasthan over the felling of the khejri tree. Communities are demanding stronger protection for the state tree, alleging that it is being cut to make way for solar power projects. Political leaders across parties have joined the movement, drawing attention to the tree’s cultural and ecological significance. In an arid landscape where survival is closely tied to ecology, the debate in western Rajasthan now extends beyond development to questions of history, identity and survival.

T20 WC: Hetmyer scripts history, achieves this feat against Scotland
description: Shimron Hetmyer's explosive 64 off 36 balls powered West Indies to 182 for 5 against Scotland. Despite a shaky start and Scotland's disciplined bowling, Hetmyer's rapid counterattack, including a 81-run partnership with Rovman Powell, secured a competitive total.  His fastest T20 World Cup fifty for West Indies highlighted his improved fitness and clear batting approach.

Modi also emphasised the global importance of the Tamil language and culture.

Investigations revealed the girls were depressed and unable to access their usual online activities. The father has three wives, who are biological sisters, and the girls' suicide note was addressed solely to him.

description: Three minor sisters in Ghaziabad died after jumping from their ninth-floor apartment, with preliminary findings suggesting emotional distress linked to family issues and confiscated mobile phones. Investigations are ongoing, examining family dynamics and the father's past.

This move could boost Cincinnati's playoff hopes.

title: Anna Kupp breaks silence with heartfelt note ahead of Super Bowl 2026
description: Cooper Kupp, the Seattle Seahawks' star player, seems to be fully focused for Super Bowl LX on Sunday as he gears up to take the field against the New England Patriots in Levi Stadium, California. Amid this, his wife, Anna, has shared a few words that reflect how the family is gearing up for the big day and how she is supporting him.

title: SpaceX 'hiring problem': Elon Musk says engineers not ready to relocate
description: SpaceX faces a significant hurdle in attracting engineers and technicians to its Starbase facility in South Texas due to limited job prospects for their spouses. Elon Musk highlighted this 'significant other' problem, noting the remote location's scarcity of non-SpaceX employment. This challenge, though less severe, also impacts Tesla's recruitment in Texas, contrasting with easier relocations from California's job-rich areas.

title: ‘In 36 months, the cheapest place to put AI will be …’: Musk makes a bold prediction
description: Elon Musk predicts space will become the most cost-effective location for AI data centers within three years. He cited advantages like five times greater solar panel efficiency, no need for batteries due to constant sunlight, and the absence of atmospheric interference.

title: Elon Musk denies Starlink phone: CEO says no device in works
description: Elon Musk has officially denied reports of SpaceX developing a Starlink phone, stating "We are not developing a phone." This clarification comes amidst speculation about the satellite internet business's expansion ahead of a potential IPO. Musk has previously expressed strong reluctance towards phone manufacturing.
